channel.title: Projects on Frank's Redily
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Frank's Redily

item.title: S1mone
item.description: A Virtual Personal Assistant with a robot interface inspired by the movie “Wall-E”. Your own personal assistant, equipped with facial recognition, voice recognition, and the ability to chitchat will be first among many other features.

item.title: Pixee
item.description: A simple Pixel Art Maker written in Python.
